Text:
Alternatively, if you want a smaller and hence faster image, you can try my concise version here.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5181425/Hauppauge_WinTV_retail_CD_concise_version_2MB
Works perfectly to use as the source cd for WinTV6 installs. The condensed 2mb and 240kb versions DO NOT work as source cd's for V6 as of 20Mar10

if your just mounting the ISO the drive letter has to be before H:
